channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter, 29th January
item.description:
As usual, build up of litter on Faversham Road street, pavement, verges - broken glass, vape packets, bottles, cans

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Faversham Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clothes and Rubbish Thrown Outside House, 29th January
item.description:
This has been going on for over two months and a half, multiple concerns raised and nothing has been done about it. Please sort it out or update us on the situation. Thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Princess May Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked fire escape and emergency TFL access on How's Street, 29th January
item.description:
Piles of rubbish blocking the fire exit gate to the entire row of arches, which is also the emergency vehicle access to the Windrush line

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Geffrye Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Number 73 - reported by few neighbours in the past, 29th January
item.description:
You can see clearly there is an issue - this had caused massive issues with mice etc My neighbours downstairs moved out because of mice issues certainly due to that - I reported it already and you sent me an e-mail telling me issue is fixed - those photos

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Princess May Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping in alley, 29th January
item.description:
Domestic rubbish and furniture all throughout our alley. This is causing Bin collections to be skipped, and has become a health and safety hazard, due to it blocking the only entrance and exit of two properties. This issue has been present for around 2 weeks, but has been slowly growing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Green Lane, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leak, 29th January
item.description:
There is a significant water leak running down Camberwell Grove that is damaging the road surface and could damage the already weak bridge over the railway line. This needs repairing urgently before it causes further damage and causes a hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 153, Camberwell Grove, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A Fly-tip Medium - 4 to 9 black bags problem has been found, 29th January
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, London

item.description:
